plot: A man remains a virgin (and a voyeur) until he finds a red cap that turns him into a stud. But a friend resents his sudden "popularity".
title: Chapeuzinho Vermelho
plot_es: A man remains a virgin (and a voyeur) until he finds a red cap that turns him into a stud. But a friend resents his sudden "popularity".
plot_en: A man remains a virgin (and a voyeur) until he finds a red cap that turns him into a stud. But a friend resents his sudden "popularity".
